advisories.description: Heap-based overflow via sudoedit allows local privilege escalation.
advisories.remediation: Upgrade sudo to 1.9.5p2 or later and redeploy across managed hosts.
advisories.exploit: If vulnerable, edit /etc/passwd via sudoedit overflow to escalate to root.

advisories.description: Improper certificate verification permits CA bypass.
advisories.remediation: Upgrade OpenSSL to 1.1.1k or newer and restart dependent services.
advisories.exploit: With crafted certificates, MITM traffic to services trusting the flawed CA chain.

advisories.description: Shellshock allows environment variable code injection.
advisories.remediation: Patch Bash to 4.4 or later and restart exposed services.
advisories.exploit: Send crafted headers to CGI scripts to execute arbitrary commands.

advisories.description: Remote code execution via buffer overflow in sshd.
advisories.remediation: Upgrade OpenSSH to 9.3p2 or later and restart sshd service.
advisories.exploit: Crafted authentication request can trigger buffer overflow leading to RCE.

advisories.description: Privilege escalation via ssh-agent forwarding.
advisories.exploit: Malicious server can extract private keys from forwarded ssh-agent.

advisories.description: Heap buffer overflow in SOCKS5 proxy handshake.
advisories.exploit: Crafted hostname in SOCKS5 proxy can cause heap overflow and RCE.

advisories.description: Cookie injection vulnerability in libcurl.
advisories.exploit: Malicious cookie can be injected into requests.

advisories.description: HTTP header injection vulnerability.
advisories.exploit: Crafted URL can inject arbitrary HTTP headers.

advisories.description: Buffer overflow in HTTP protocol handling.
advisories.exploit: Crafted HTTP response can trigger buffer overflow.

advisories.description: Buffer overflow in PyCArg_repr function.
advisories.exploit: Crafted ctypes call can trigger buffer overflow.

advisories.description: Buffer overflow in ctypes.c_double.
advisories.exploit: Crafted ctypes call can cause buffer overflow.

advisories.description: Arbitrary file write via git clone on case-insensitive filesystems.
advisories.exploit: Malicious repository can write files outside working directory.

advisories.description: Remote code execution via git clone with submodules.
advisories.exploit: Crafted submodule configuration can execute arbitrary code.

advisories.description: Privilege escalation via BuildKit cache mounts.
advisories.exploit: BuildKit cache mounts can access host filesystem.

advisories.description: Information disclosure via Docker Desktop.
advisories.exploit: Unauthorized access to Docker Desktop settings.

advisories.description: Request smuggling via mod_proxy_uwsgi.
advisories.remediation: Upgrade Apache to 2.4.58 or later and restart httpd.
advisories.exploit: Crafted requests can bypass security controls via request smuggling.

advisories.description: Denial of service via mod_rewrite.
advisories.remediation: Upgrade Apache to 2.4.57 or later and restart httpd.
advisories.exploit: Crafted rewrite rules can cause server crash.

advisories.description: Privilege escalation via improper privilege checks.
advisories.remediation: Upgrade MySQL to 8.0.36 or later and restart mysqld.
advisories.exploit: Authenticated user can escalate privileges via crafted queries.

advisories.description: Remote code execution via component vulnerability.
advisories.remediation: Upgrade MySQL to 8.0.33 or later and restart mysqld.
advisories.exploit: Crafted network packet can trigger RCE.

advisories.description: Memory disclosure via COPY FROM STDIN.
advisories.remediation: Upgrade PostgreSQL to 16.2 or later and restart postgresql service.
advisories.exploit: Crafted COPY command can leak memory contents.

advisories.description: Privilege escalation via CREATE INDEX CONCURRENTLY.
advisories.remediation: Upgrade PostgreSQL to 16.1 or later and restart postgresql service.
advisories.exploit: Authenticated user can escalate privileges via concurrent index creation.

advisories.description: Integer overflow in ngx_http_mp4_module.
advisories.remediation: Upgrade nginx to 1.23.3 or later and restart nginx service.
advisories.exploit: Crafted MP4 file can cause integer overflow and potential RCE.

advisories.description: HTTP/2 rapid reset denial of service.
advisories.remediation: Upgrade nginx to 1.25.3 or later and restart nginx service.
advisories.exploit: Rapid HTTP/2 connection resets can cause DoS.

advisories.description: Code injection via process.binding.
advisories.exploit: Crafted code can bypass process.binding restrictions.

advisories.description: HTTP request smuggling via llhttp.
advisories.exploit: Crafted HTTP requests can bypass security controls.

advisories.description: Privilege escalation via systemd-tmpfiles.
advisories.exploit: Crafted tmpfiles configuration can create files with wrong permissions.

advisories.description: Local privilege escalation via systemd-tmpfiles.
advisories.exploit: Crafted tmpfiles.d configuration can escalate privileges.
